name: verbose_level
longdoc:
Verbosity level for information logging

0: Only errors
1: Warning
2: Information
3: Debug

name: geometry
shortdoc: define physical constants of your experiment here

name: nx
shortdoc: raster scan: number of steps in x

name: phase_noise_rms
shortdoc: phase noise amplitude on incoming wave before aperture

name: phase_noise_mfs
shortdoc: phase noise minimum feature size on incoming wave before aperture

name: aperture_edge
shortdoc: edge width of aperture in pixel

name: focal_dist
shortdoc: distance from prefocus aperture to focus

name: prop_dist
shortdoc:
focus: propagation distance from focus
parallel: propagation distance from aperture

name: UseConjugate
shortdoc: use the conjugate of the probe instef of the probe

name: antialiasing
shortdoc: antialiasing factor used when generating the probe

name: diameter
shortdoc: if aperture_size = None this parameter is used instead
